Is it safe to sell SSC ?

Seller's SSC is hold in an escrow when you open the trade, so you can send payment to seller without worry. If the seller refused to release SSC after you sent the payment, click on the 'Dispute' button and our support team with show up to help.

When will I recive SSC ?

Seller's SSC is hold in an escrow when you open the trade, so you can send payment to seller without worry. If the seller refused to release SSC after you sent the payment, click on the 'Dispute' button and our support team with show up to help.
